Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Atlantis The Palm in Dubai (Palm Jumeirah), you'll be minutes from Aquaventure. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Ski Dubai and Mall of the Emirates.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 1539 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 20 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a poolside bar or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 20 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a poolside bar or a swim-up bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.
Make yourself at home in one of the 1539 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

With a stay at Atlantis The Palm in Dubai (Palm Jumeirah), you'll be minutes from Aquaventure. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Ski Dubai and Mall of the Emirates.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Aquaventure - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Skydive Dubai - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Dubai College - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
American University of Dubai - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Dubai Marina - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
The Beach Mall - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Dubai Marina Mall - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi
Emirates Golf Club - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Souk Madinat Jumeirah - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Wild Wadi Water Park - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Jebel Ali Race Course - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Montgomerie Golf Club - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Umm Suqeim Beach - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Ski Dubai - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Mall of the Emirates - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 18.3 km / 11.3 mi
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi

The preferred airport for Atlantis The Palm is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Atlantis The Palm is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 27.1 km / 16.9 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 04/Jul/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Dubai Tourism Dirham Fee - AED20 for 5 stars properties per room per night, applies from 31.03.14 to be paid bythe guest directly at the Hotel/Hotel apartment.**New Year Eve Gala Dinner is complusory for all bookings stay for 31st Dec 2018. Please ensure to check supplement for Gala Dinner if already inclusive in the rates or otherwise it will be charged to guest upon check in at hotel directly" ** Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Half board Rooms

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly to hotel per room per night valid from 31st March 2014 Onward. Booking including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless stated. Early departure- 100% charge. Name change will be considered new booking & will be subject to availability. Unlimited access to aqua venture and the Lost Chambers for all guests staying in-house. Lost chambers opening and closing times will be from 10am until 10pm. Half-board must be booked for the entire stay. All suites include imperial club access and imperial club benefits. Suite booking includes complimentary return airport transfers. The KALEIDOSCOPE dining buffet is back. There will be an additional AED 5 supplement charge per adult and AED 2.5 per child ( 4 to 11 years) at Ronda Locatelli and Bread street Kitchen Note: 4th & 5th Adult in 2 bedroom suites will be based on roll away beds.

Essential Information: Room 1

Lost chambers opening and closing times will be from 10am until 10pm. Half-board must be booked for the entire stay. All suites include imperial club access and imperial club benefits. Suite booking includes complimentary return airport transfers. The KALEIDOSCOPE dining buffet is back. There will be an additional AED 5 supplement charge per adult and AED 2.5 per child ( 4 to 11 years) at Ronda Locatelli and Bread street Kitchen Note: 4th & 5th Adult in 2 bedroom suites will be based on roll away beds.

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Lost chambers opening and closing times will be from 10am until 10pm. Half-board must be booked for the entire stay. All suites include imperial club access and imperial club benefits. Suite booking includes complimentary return airport transfers. The KALEIDOSCOPE dining buffet is back. There will be an additional AED 5 supplement charge per adult and AED 2.5 per child ( 4 to 11 years) at Ronda Locatelli and Bread street Kitchen Note: 4th & 5th Adult in 2 bedroom suites will be based on roll away beds.
